title: Giant Pandas
author: Alastair
pages:
The giant panda,
Ailuropoda
melanoleuca, also
known as the panda
bear, or simply the
panda, is a bear
native to South
Central China! (is this
even south central
china i have no idea)



The chinese words
for panda is
 
literally meaning bear
cat
it's pronounced like
siong mao
please try to
pronounce it i swear I
won't laugh



They used to be an
endangered species,
but in July 2021, the
Chinese authorities
reclassified it as
vulnerable instead of
endangered which is
amazing news





FUN FACT!
Pandas have a tail, it's
just hidden by their
sheer chonkiness









in conclusion:
i love pandas so much
